dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures. Double hemispherical world map on a globular projection. In upper right corner: 2. From Bradley's atlas of the world for commercial and library reference. 1 map: col.; 2 hemispheres each 28 cm. in diam., on sheet 49 x 65 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Wm. M. Bradley & Bros.,Wm. M. Bradley & Bros. Bradley's atlas of the world.
